ref.mixed-citation:
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Interim Infection Prevention and Control Recommendations for Patients with Confirmed Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) or Persons Under Investigation for COVID-19 in Healthcare Settings. Updated February 21, 2020 Available at
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/infectioncontrol/control-recommendations.html?CDC_AA_refVal=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cdc.gov%2Fcoronavirus%2F2019-ncov%2Fhcp%2Finfection-control.html , visited on February 28 2020.
